  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111916</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kdo je kdo?</string>
            <string language="en">Who is who?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wer ist, wer?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qui est qui ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quem é quem?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chi è chi?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιος είναι ποιοι;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Quién es quién?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Preberi posamezne opise in jih primerjaj s sličicami. Potem določi, kdo je kdo.
Izvirna datoteka (dva kviza, lahko sta povezana. lahko samostojna) Hot Potatoes, primerna za prilagajanje po svojih potrebah.</string>
            <string language="en">Read the given description of a person and compare it with the given pictures. (Hot Potatoes source code is included).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opis</string>
            <string language="en">description</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sklepanje</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesen Sie die gegebene Beschreibung einer Person und 
vergleichen Sie sie mit den gegebenen Abbildungen. (heißes 
Kartoffelquellenprogramm ist enthalten).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lisez la description donnée d'une personne et 
comparez-l'aux images données. (le code source chaud de pommes 
de terre est inclus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leia a descrição dada de uma pessoa e compare-a com os 
retratos dados. (o código de fonte quente das batatas é 
incluído).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legga la data descrizione di una persona e paragonila alle
date immagini. (il codice sorgente caldo delle patate è 
incluso).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάστε τη δεδομένη περιγραφή ενός προσώπου και την 
συγκρίνετε με τις δεδομένες εικόνες. (Ο καυτός κώδικας 
πηγής πατατών συμπεριλαμβάνεται).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lea la descripción dada de una persona y compárela con 
los cuadros dados. (el código de fuente caliente de las patatas
es incluido).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">description</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descrição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">observação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">osservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγραφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρατήρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descripción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">observación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
